number.description: Unique number (across all products of a vendor) that identifies the licensee. Vendor can assign this number when creating a licensee or let NetLicensing generate one. Read-only after creation of the first license for the licensee

productNumber.description: productNumber to assign new licensee object

active.description: If set to 'false', the licensee is disabled. Licensee can not obtain new licenses, and validation is disabled
